text: 26:23 Aisaia 42:6; 49:6; Luk 24:26; 24:44-47; 1 Korin 15:20; Kolosi 1:18Me kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, Gumazir God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezim, Krais, a mɨzazim inigh aremegh, egh faraghɨvɨra ovevemɨn dɨkavighamin gumazimɨn otogham. Egh, a Godɨn angazangarimɨn gun Israelia ko Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibav kɨmam.”
